en.ODSAinstructions: Evaluate the postfix expression. You can performe an operation on the two topmost values in a stack by moving an operator into the evaluator.
en.ms_com_operand: The operands go into the operand stack.
en.ms_com_operator: The operator goes into the evaluator.
en.ms_com_pop: The two topmost values from the stack are popped.
en.ms_com_push: And the value is pushed back onto the stack.
